name: You Will Type
description:
Simple arcade game to teach type typing. You will type in this game. Type fast and under the pressure of snakes!

Each turn you move one tile. You select a tile typing exact letter. You will be moved there. If you made a mistake snakes will move. Avoid them. Get to the city as fast as you can!

Source code and all assets available at https://github.com/w84death/you-will-type
